commit message: Feed: Shallow copy activity list. Removes race condition.
Begin integrating liking comments into the interface
Increase read buffer size. Should reduce the GC churn for feed loading.
Don't crash constructing context menu on null object
Fix crash bug in ObjectActivity: Toasts can't be created on the AsyncTask background thread
Be more pedantic about the proxyURL
ObjectActivity: More reliable handling of fetch errors
ObjectActivity: use a viewflipper to increase reliability with slow loading objects
PostActivity: Cosmetic update to match the rest of Android
Change from UrlImageViewHelper to a custom implementation (simpler, plus understands OAuth for proxyURLs). Necessitated some changes to the OAuth interface
Back out object refresh. Should recieve updates via feed(s) anyhow.
Always try and fetch the full comments list
